summary: W3TC was looking for a leading global delivery network that could provide the best latency performance for its WordPress users and partnering with bunny. net made it a no-brainer to connect and create a powerful partnership you can now use to create amazing websites.
title: Build fast-loading websites that users love with bunny.net and W3 Total Cache

summary: Ben has an excellent post expanding on my findings about Perplexity ignoring robots. txt.  He also digs into the various ways prompt injection does and doesn't work...
title: As If Perplexity Didn’t Suck Enough They’re Also Hotlinking Images

summary:
If you’ve been reading my blog, you’ve noticed that I have written a lot about AI and democracy, mostly with my co-author Nathan Sanders.  I am pleased to announce that we’re writing a book on the topic. 
This isn’t a book about deep fakes, or misinformation...
title: Upcoming Book on AI and Democracy
